attributes.action: Review the new dental charges and create fairer charges in between 42.50 and 189.00 dependant on works needed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new dental charges creat a mechansim for the public to understand how much They will be charged at a NHS dentist, but one filling is the same price as two and one crown etc the same as three very unfair to the patient requiring only a small job but outside the current pricing i would like to see a 72 pound range and a 125 pound range introduced to have 5 bands instead of 3 making it fairer

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
